00025 // LinkSynNrnInterfaceBase class definition
00026 // general interface
00027 // the method performcaculations() is to be called by the neuron within update()

00030 class SynMechInterface
00031 //    : public boost::noncopyable
00032 {
00033     template <class PoissonParameter, class ActivationFunction> friend class PoissonMech;
00034     friend class IFMech;
00035     friend class InstantIFMech;
00036     friend class DataCommonNeuron;
00037 public:
00038     virtual ~SynMechInterface() {}
00039     double weight;
00040     double delay;
00041 protected:
00042     virtual void send_updated_states(double & current) = 0;
00043     virtual void send_updated_states(double & conductance, double & current) = 0;
00044 };

00049 // SynapseInterface class definition
00050 // general interface
00051 // the method on_preneuron_fire_update() is to be called by the preneuron when it fires, within notify_firing_impl() of the DataCommonNeuron class
00052 // the methods on_preneuron_fire_plast_update() and on_postneuron_fire_plast_update() are to be called by the neurons within plast_update()
00054 
00055 class SynapseInterface
00056 {
00057     friend class DataPlastNeuron;
00058     friend class DataCommonNeuron;
00059 public:
00060     SynapseInterface(NeuronInterface * post_nrn) : post_nrn_(post_nrn) {}
00061     virtual ~SynapseInterface() {}
00062     virtual const double & weight() = 0;
00063     const NeuronInterface & post_nrn() const {
00064         return *post_nrn_;
00065     }
00066 #ifdef PARALLELSIM
00067     void send(double sendtime, ConfigBase*);
00068     void deliver(double, ConfigBase*);
00069     void record(double t);
00070     int gid_;
00071     unsigned char localgid_; // compressed gid for spike transfer
00072     std::deque<double> tqe_; //stores delivered events
00073 
00074 #endif
00075 protected:
00076     virtual void on_preneuron_fire_update(const double & spike_time) = 0;
00077     virtual void on_preneuron_fire_plast_update(const double & spike_time) = 0;
00078     virtual void on_postneuron_fire_plast_update(const double & spike_time) = 0;
00079     virtual SynMechInterface * const syn_mech() const = 0;
00080 private:
00081     NeuronInterface * const post_nrn_;
00082 };

00087 // NeuronInterface class definition
00088 // general interface
00089 // the method add_presynapse() is to be called in the main, to connect the network
00090 // the method update() is to be called in the main, to run the simulation at each time step increase
00091 // the method plast_update() is to be called in the main, after the update of all the neurons, to
00093 
00094 class NeuronInterface
00095         : public IdCounter<NeuronInterface>
00096 {
00097     template <class SynData, class SynMech, class PlastMech, class TypeBase> friend class SynapseTemplate;
00098 public:
00099     NeuronInterface() {}
00100     virtual ~NeuronInterface() {}
00101     virtual const Volt & potential() const = 0;
00102     virtual void apply_visitor(AbstractVisitor & vis) = 0;
00103     virtual void update() = 0; //  passer en protected
00104     // bool operator==( const std::list<NeuronInterface*>::const_iterator& itRHS)
00105     //{return(itLHS == itRHS);}
00106     //bool operator!=(const std::list<NeuronInterface*>::const_iterator& itRHS)
00107     //{return(!(this->itLHS == itRHS));}
00108 #ifdef PARALLELSIM
00109     void set_gid(int id) {
00110         gid_ = id;
00111     }
00112     const int gid() {
00113         return gid_;
00114     }
00115 protected:
00116     int gid_;
00117 #endif
00118 
00119 protected:
00120     //std::list<NeuronInterface*>::iterator itLHS;
00121     virtual void add_presynapse(SynapseInterface * const syn) = 0;
00122     virtual void add_postsynapse(SynapseInterface * const syn) = 0;
00123 
00124 
00125 };
